Articles.Content:
This challenge is about getting a trajectory on any body as high as possible. This means high speed, yes, but high speed at a body with low gravity. By getting myself through Moho's SOI on a retrograde orbit, I managed an eccentricity of over 21000.

Leaderboard:

Stock:

Unaltered Mods:

.cfg edits:

You may use Mechjeb to determine the eccentricity of your orbit, or you may dig up this value from your save file. Using mechjeb as the side capsule is allowable in a stock entry (using the Mechjeb command module or Mechjeb Thruster/Engine Mix falls under Unaltered Mods, unless they are manually edited)
